name: Amica and Timeo
description:
An original fairytale.

Content Warning: Brief reference to self-harm.

---

This game is dedicated to the anxiety I had last week. Love ya, could not have made this without you. It's also dedicated to all my classmates who shared their Fungus tips, wisdom, and moral support with me. <3 Could not have made this without you either! Also pleasedon'ttellWinnieandGregwhattimeIfinishedmakingthistheothernightTHANKSBYE*.
